name: zineshop-fullstack
description: ZineShop - Full-stack e-commerce application with React frontend and Express.js backend

scripts.dev: npm run build:production && npm run server:dev
scripts.start: npm run build:production && npm run server:start
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:client: cd client && npm run build && rm -rf dist
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server

author: Zine El Aabidine Hamdoun
